Instructions:

  1. Adjust the height of the seat so that you can touch the bar with the tip of your finger
  2. Adjust the height of the thigh stop so that it prevents you from moving up
  3. Partially Stand back up and grab the bar
  4. Pull the bar down while sitting down
  5. Pretend to bend the bar inwards while pulling down, leaning back a little
  6. PULL!
